messages.message:
<!here> A few questions about dogfood:
1. How often do you use dogfood?
2. Do you see slowness with dogfood?
I am trying to gauge whether we need to scale up dogfood.

the official recommendation as of a few months ago was “maximize using dogfood so we catch bugs early / before UAT week”, so i’ve been using it a fair amount. probably for >60% of work. only when things seem to be janky (running slow, unexpected error messages) or something is just broken (`text-editor` bug earlier today) do i switch back to prod.

i see slowness pretty frequently, especially with larger jobs.

folks using dogfood to help catch bugs early already have bugs/daily deployments to deal with, i would say we should size dogfood similar to prod so that they also don’t have to deal with speed differences :slightly_smiling_face:
I use dogfood exclusively and have been pushing others to as well (for demos, POCs) so we can catch bugs as quickly as possible
